item.description:
Mindfulness and Non-duality presented by Steve Ioanilli


Non-duality : “not two”

 

Mindfulness and non-duality invite us to look simply and clearly at our experience of life as it really is. From this clear seeing, a new understanding may emerge, guiding us to pure, open awareness. This understanding can permeate all aspects of our lives, bringing lasting peace and happiness.

Join us for a gentle, contemplative exploration of our experience at the level of the mind and the body. There will be silence, guided meditation, and discussion.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a red sign outside that says: "Revolution Books", Whole Living Center is located in the same building.
item.name: Mindfulness and Non-duality
